title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 596.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 596.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) The provisions
of this Part shall apply to any licensed, designated, or authorized provider of
services pursuant to Article 31 of the Mental Hygiene Law who has been
authorized by the Office under this Part to include the use of Telehealth

Services as a means of rendering services licensed, designated, or authorized
by the Office. (b) The provisions
of this Part shall not be construed to alter the scope of practice of any
licensee or authorize the delivery of services in a setting, or in a manner, not otherwise authorized by law. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
